name: mern-role-based-dashboard
description: A MERN stack application with role-based access control for managing students and user authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\dist dist
scripts.build:full: npm run build --prefix frontend && xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\dist dist && npm run start
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps

author: Chiranjeevi
